StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [migrate_179]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
as
print 'Star.ng PERSON' exec SP_P_PROCESS179
print 'Star.ng MARINE CANDIDATE' exec SP_MC_PROCESS179
print 'Star.ng NWA' exec SP_NWA_PROCESS179
print 'Star.ng CONTRACT' exec SP_CON_PROCESS179
print 'Star.ng SHIPPER' exec SP_SHIP_PROCESS179
print 'Star.ng ASVAB' exec SPGEN_CANDASVAB179
print 'Star.ng ADDRESS' exec SPGEN_CANDADDRESS
print 'Star.ng DEPENDENT' exec SPGEN_CANDDEPENDENT
print 'Star.ng MEDICAL EXAM' exec SPGEN_CANDMEDICAL_EXAM
print 'Star.ng SPECIAL EXAM' exec SPGEN_CANDSPECIAL_EXAM
print 'Star.ng LANGUAGE' exec SPGEN_CANDLANGUAGE
print 'Star.ng EDUCATION' exec SPGEN_CANDEDUCATION179
print 'Star.ng PROFESSED EXAM' exec SP_GENCANDIDATE_PROFESSEDEXAM
print 'Star.ng TELEPHONE' exec SPGEN_CANDTELEPHONE
print 'Star.ng REFERRAL' exec SP_REFERRAL_179
print 'Star.ng PROGRAMS' exec SPGEN_PROGRAM_CRITERIA
print 'Star.ng WAIVERS' exec sp_gen_waivers179
--inserts a record into the meps schedule table
insert meps_schedule (NWA_ID,MEPS_ORGANIZATION_ID,PROCESSING_DATE,ARRIVAL_DATE,ASVAB,SPECIAL_EXAM, COMPLETE_PHYSICAL,INSPECTION_PHYSICAL,CONSULTATION_PHYSICAL,CONTRACT, SHIP,OTHER_PROCESSING,PROCESSING_STATUS,LODGING_REQUIRED,TRANSPORTATION_REQUIRED,SPECIAL_EXAM_TYPE, PROCESSING_NOTES,DELETED,USER_LOGIN,UPDATE_DATE) select n.NWA_ID, a.MEPS_ORGANIZATION_ID, c.contract_begin_date, c.contract_begin_date,'N','N', 'N','N','N','Y', 'N','Y','S','N','N','N', 'migrated schedule record','N','migra.on',getdate() from nwa n, contract c, candidate_status cs, candidate_asvab a where n.nwa_id not in (select nwa_id from meps_schedule) and n.marine_candidate_id = a.marine_candidate_id and n.nwa_id = c.nwa_id and n.user_login = 'migra.on' and a.meps_organiza.on_id is not null and n.nwa_id = cs.nwa_id and cs.candidate_status_id = (select max(candidate_status_id) from candidate_status where nwa_id = n.nwa_id) and cs.status_type = 'E' and cs.status_code = 'B'and cs.disposi.on_code = 'K'
